articles.author: Alison Bloomer
articles.title: Covid-19 vaccines saved at least 1.4 million lives, say WHO - Pavilion Health Today
articles.description: Covid-19 vaccines have reduced deaths due to the pandemic by at least 57%, saving more than 1.4 million lives in Europe, most of which were older patients.
articles.content: Covid-19 vaccines have reduced deaths due to the pandemic by at least 57% and have saved more than 1.4 million lives in Europe, most of which were older patients, according to the World Health Organi… [+2956 chars]
